Author: mediocremermaidd
Text: I'm in uni now but my ed was quite bad at the beginning of high school.  It is shitty you are completely valid for feeling that way.  Maybe you could talk to your parents and tell them what is helpful/ not helpful?   also if you feel comfortable with it I would suggest  telling your nutrition teacher about your ed and asking to not be tested on triggering material.  I was exempted from a few things in high school bio to do with nutrition after telling my teacher about things
